title: Chef in Another World - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Chefs   Cooking   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Banana   바나바다
description:
Taeyang Kang, a prized chef was pursuing his dream to become the best chef in Korea. But suddenly, one day the world changed…….with gates, dungeons, monsters, and Awakened. Regrettably, Taeyang couldn’t find his place in this new world.

But everything change with a single text message. 
[Restaurant “Aurora”]->recruiting staff >
